entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Showers or drizzle ending this morning then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High 12. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Tuesday 2 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers this evening then 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Tuesday 2 May 2023
